title: kathaya kathaya rasanE anurAgEna
sahitya:
kathaya kathaya rasanE anurAgEna kONEna rasanEna vasanEna


anupallavi

  naTa nArada shuka munivara brndam navanItacOra nanda gOvindam


caraNam    lAvaNya mrdugAtram rAga naTana gOpAngana caritram
bhAva rAga tALayuta muraLI paTutara nAda caturam pavitram
